Name: Taurus Majoris Mining
Description: Taurus Majoris Mining is the largest mining company in the Taurian Concordat. In 3025, the company employed over 2 million people with most of them prospecting afield for future ore deposits. They also maintained a commercial fleet of over ten DropShips and almost two dozen mobile refinery stations throughout Taurian space. They maintain large facilities on Laconis and Camadeirre.
ReputationStatements: We need a security auxiliary complement to lawful corporate operations in this system, if you're interested.

MissionSuccessStatements: Well done, Commander. We obviously placed our faith in the right mercenary company. We'll let you know if we have any other work for you.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: You win some, you lose some. Sometimes it's in between. I'm disappointed you couldn't complete the contract, but at least you gave it your best shot.
BadFaithFailureStatements: For somebody who came so highly recommended, you let us down pretty hard. Thanks for nothing, I guess.
